info.title: Resource Pool Management
info.description: This is Swagger UI environment generated for the TMF Resource Pool Management specification

get.description: This operation list or find Reservation entities

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Comma-separated properties to be provided in response

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Requested index for start of resources to be provided in response

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Requested number of resources to be provided in response

X-Result-Count.description: Actual number of items returned in the response body

X-Total-Count.description: Total number of items matching criteria

amount.description: A value and units, such as 10000 ea, 10B Mb. Instance values are mutually exclusive with From and To Amounts and range interval.

amountFrom.description: The low range value that Amount can take on.

amountTo.description: The upper range value that Amount can take on.

rangeInterval.description:
An indicator that specifies the inclusion or exclusion of the AmountFrom and AmountTo attributes. 
Possible values are "open", "closed", "closedBottom" and "closedTop".

channel.description: The channel defines the channel for selling product offerings.

requestedPeriod.description:
The period of time for which user requested to use the resources. 
The user can request on the start date without the end date.

resourceCapacityDemand.description: the amount of capacity that is planned to be consumed or has been consumed.
